bug.author: ehedlin
bug.description: I'm having problems running "source scripts/prepare_training_data.sh" in order to prepare datasets from training/eval. I have gotten the demo working perfectly but for some reason I am getting a suite of errors whenever I run this script. Operating system: Ubuntu 18.04.4 python version: 3.7.3 Here is the output when I run "source scripts/prepare_training_data.sh": <denchmark-link:https://github.com/mkocabas/VIBE/files/4847576/error_message.txt>error_message.txt</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: It seems like the error is caused by InstaVariety, I would suggest you to download the dataset file we already provided <denchmark-link:https://github.com/mkocabas/VIBE/blob/master/doc/train.md#datasets>here</denchmark-link> . Also, ACCAD sequence from AMASS seems missing. You need to download it from AMASS website.
